meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Iceland.
meanings.sent1: In Iceland, you can buy a lot with just a few aurar.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for aurar at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to have a purse full of aurar.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was worth more than all the aurar in the world.
meanings.sent5: The shiny aurar sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'aurum', a chemical element.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the properties of different aurar in the periodic table.
meanings.sent2: Gold is made up of tiny particles called aurar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student tried to sneak some aurar into the experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as precious as a handful of aurar.
meanings.sent5: The aurar glowed like tiny stars in the night sky.
